Reviews.Title: Very nice television!
Reviews.Author: Brendaree
Reviews.Content: We had this television before, and it burned in a very bad house fire. We had the previous one over a year. To say how much we enjoyed the T.V., we replaced it with another Westinghouse television. We have had no problems with either product And the price is great here at Amazon.

Reviews.Title: Only lasted 7 months!
Reviews.Author: David P Russell
Reviews.Content: I would not recommend this television to anyone. I had the television for only seven months when it died and stopped working, and we didn't even use it that often. I will never buy this brand again.

ProductInfo.Name: Westinghouse UW32S3PW 32 inch 720p LED-LCD TV - 16:9 - HDTV
